nodes.name: balanceOf
balanceOfCredentialType
ownerOf
_transfer
transferFrom
approve

attributes.name: balanceOf
balanceOfCredentialType
ownerOf
_transfer
transferFrom
approve

approve(address,uint256).details: Approves another address to transfer the given credential ID The zero address indicates there is no approved address. There can only be one approved address per credential at a time. Can only be called by the issuer of the credential.

params._approved: The new approved person that can transfer the credential to himself
params._tokenId: The credential that is being approved

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of credentials owned by a specific address.
balanceOf(address).return: uint256 representing the number of credentials owned by the passed address

balanceOfCredentialType(address,uint16).details: Returns the number of credentials of a specific type owned by a specific address.

params._type: The type of credential to check

balanceOfCredentialType(address,uint16).return: uint16 representing the number of credentials of a specific type owned by the passed address

changeRank(uint256).details: This function is can be called by the owner of the credential to change the rank of the credential or by the issuer of the credential. The rank can only be changed if the rank is not already Diamond. The function requires the caller to send the ranking fee in order to change the rank if the caller is the owner. The function allows the issuer to directly set the rank without paying the fee. The function increments the rank of the credential by one.

params._credentialId: The ID of the credential to change the rank of.

getCredentialsByOwner(address).details: This function returns all the credentials owned by a given address.

params._owner: The address to query the credentials of.

getCredentialsByOwner(address).return: An array of credential IDs owned by the address.

getRankingTypes().details: This function returns all the credentials ranking types.
getRankingTypes().return: An array of credential ranking types.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of the credential with the given ID.

params._tokenId: The ID of the credential to query the owner of

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setRankByIssuer(uint256,uint8).details: This function allows the issuer of the credential to directly set the rank to the desired type without requiring a fee.

params._credentialId: The ID of the credential to change the rank of.
params._newRank: The desired rank to set for the credential.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers the ownership of a given credential ID to another address. Only the issuer of the credential or an approved address can transfer a credential.

params._from: The current owner of the credential (aka issuer)

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
